title: The Crazies
description:
This is an Iso file. Open up imgburn or roxio and add the image file and (burn image to disk). After the process is complete, just play on any dvd player, xbox 360 or ps3,ect. This has been tested before uploading. Absolutely no viruses. Your welcome people!







Storyline
As a toxin begins to turn the residents of Ogden Marsh, Iowa into violent psychopaths, sheriff David Dutton tries to make sense of the situation while he, his wife, and two other unaffected townspeople band together in a fight for survival. Written by IMDb Editors
